content:
assistant> Hello! I’m your AI guide for building a doodle caption. I’m designed to ask you questions and guide your reasoning but if you want to take control of your own creative process, I’ll be happy to help wherever possible.
user> Howdy!!

The Aiding style can be effectively employed here to encourage the user to generate creative ideas for their droodle caption, especially if they start to express frustration or confusion. By offering to step in with ideas while reassuring them of the collaborative nature of the process, you empower the user to engage more deeply in the task.
